title: Sundar Pichai - Wikipedia
snippet: Pichai Sundararajan (born June 10, 1972), better known as Sundar Pichai (pronounced: /ˈsʊndɜːr pɪˈtʃeɪ/), is an Indian-American business executive. He is the chief executive officer (CEO) of Alphabet Inc. and its subsidiary Google. Pichai began his career as a materials engineer.

title: Sundar Pichai - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Sundar is the CEO of Google and Alphabet and serves on Alphabet's Board of Directors. He joined Google in 2004 and helped lead the development of Google Toolbar and then Google Chrome, which grew to become the world's most popular internet browser.

title: Who is the CEO of Google? Sundar Pichai’s Bio | Clay
snippet: Born in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India, Sundar Pichai is an accomplished business executive who currently serves as the CEO of both Google and its parent company, Alphabet Inc. Pichai's educational background includes a degree in metallurgical engineering from IIT Kharagpur, an M.S.

title: Sundar Pichai | Biography, Google, & Facts | Britannica Money
snippet: Sundar Pichai became CEO of Google in 2015 and CEO of Alphabet in 2019. He has held roles such as vice president of product development, senior vice president, and product chief.

title: Sundar Pichai Biography: Leadership and Life Wisdom from Goggle's CEO: Stallworth, George: 9798866220694: Amazon.com: Books
snippet: From his modest beginnings in India to his groundbreaking contributions to products like Chrome, Android, and Google Cloud, this biography uncovers the secrets behind Pichai's remarkable success.
